headline: Democrats Are Upbeat, but Face a Tough Race Ahead
description: In Chicago, Democrats celebrated Kamala Harris's presidential nomination with optimism, though they recognize challenges lie ahead, including her upcoming debate with Donald Trump.
newsletter_headline: Democrats Are Upbeat, but Face a Tough Race Ahead
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Powell said the “time has come” for interest rate cuts. Here’s the latest at the end of Friday.

headline: Powell said the ‘time has come’ for interest rate cuts
description: Jerome Powell, the chair of the Federal Reserve, indicated today that the central bank was on track to lower borrowing costs at its meeting next month, signaling a possible end to high interest rates to combat inflation.
newsletter_headline: Democrats Are Upbeat, but Face a Tough Race Ahead
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Powell said the “time has come” for interest rate cuts. Here’s the latest at the end of Friday.

headline: Ukraine ramped up its attacks in Russia
description: Ukrainian forces have gained control of over 400 square miles in the Kursk region of Russia, targeting airfields, ports, and oil depots to weaken Russia's war effort.

headline: Zoë Kravitz was frustrated, so she made a movie
description: Zoë Kravitz wrote her first screenplay, 'Blink Twice,' a horror-mystery film in theaters today, as an expression of her frustrations with women's societal discomforts.
